description.fr: L'intelligence pour permettre de meilleurs soins aux patients

description.en-US: Protect your investment and help ensure continuous patient services with GE Healthcare’s power quality solutions. Our solutions help provide confidence and peace of mind.
description.fr: Protégez votre investissement et contribuez à assurer des services continus aux patients avec les solutions de qualité de l’énergie de GE Healthcare. Nos solutions contribuent à apporter confiance et tranquillité d'esprit.

description.en-US: Disconnect panels provide service and emergency shut down to help protect assets from power outages and surges.
description.fr: Les panneaux de déconnexion fournissent le service et l'arrêt d'urgence pour aider à protéger les actifs contre les pannes de courant et les surtensions.

description.en-US: Protect imaging devices from common, day-to-day power disturbances with our Dynamic Sag Corrector.
description.fr: Protégez les appareils d'imagerie contre les perturbations de courant courantes au quotidien avec notre correcteur d'affaissement dynamique.

title.en-US: The simplified solution for all your clinical needs
title.fr: La solution simplifiée pour tous vos besoins cliniques

description.en-US:
Whether you want to expand the capabilities of your equipment or simply need replacement consumables, GE Healthcare Accessories & Supplies help deliver performance, reliability, and compatibility with your GE equipment.

Carefully selected to meet some of the highest standards of utility, performance and reliability, GE Healthcare Accessories & Supplies help make your imaging and care facilities more efficient and productive while also giving your patients a more pleasant experience.

We’ve also simplified the selection and shopping process so that you can spend less time shopping and more time keeping patient care your top priority.
description.fr:
Que vous souhaitiez étendre les capacités de votre équipement ou que vous ayez simplement besoin de consommables de remplacement, les accessoires et fournitures GE Healthcare vous aident à offrir performances, fiabilité et compatibilité avec votre équipement GE.

Sélectionnés avec soin pour répondre à certaines des normes les plus élevées d'utilité, de performance et de fiabilité, les accessoires et fournitures GE Healthcare contribuent à rendre vos installations d'imagerie et de soins plus efficaces et productives tout en offrant à vos patients une expérience plus agréable.

Nous avons également simplifié le processus de sélection et d'achat afin que vous puissiez passer moins de temps à magasiner et plus de temps à faire des soins aux patients votre priorité absolue.

description.en-US: SensorySuite™ patient experience, biopsy accessories, and furniture help create a more comfortable patient experience and increase staff productivity.
description.fr: L'expérience patient SensorySuite ™, les accessoires de biopsie et les meubles contribuent à créer une expérience patient plus confortable et à augmenter la productivité du personnel.

description.en-US: Radiation protection, drapes, and table accessories help clinicians increase patient throughput and improve exam quality.
description.fr: La radioprotection, les draps et les accessoires de table aident les cliniciens à augmenter le débit des patients et à améliorer la qualité des examens.

description.en-US: ECG electrodes, papers, and other supplies for productive and efficient care.
description.fr: Électrodes ECG, papiers et autres fournitures pour des soins productifs et efficaces.

title.fr: CT, PET / CT et médecine nucléaire

description.en-US: Oncology accessories, slickers, and patient positioning aids help optimize exam accuracy and give patients a more pleasant experience.
description.fr: Les accessoires d'oncologie, les slickers et les aides au positionnement du patient aident à optimiser la précision de l'examen et offrent aux patients une expérience plus agréable.

description.en-US: AIR™ Recon DL  delivering TrueFidelity™ Images, is a deep-learning application designed to improve signal-to-noise and image sharpness, enabling shorter scan times.

Embo ASSIST* with Virtual Injection, is a 3D visualization software solution designed to help clinicians simulate injections dynamically and thus perform embolization procedures with confidence.

*510(k) pending at U.S. FDA. Not available for sale in the United States.

CT Smart Subscription provides access to all the latest software for CT devices, all the time, for one fee per device per year.

Available on: Revolution Apex, Revolution Frontier Gen 2, Revolution EVO Gen 2, Revolution HD, Discovery CT 750 HD, and Optima CT 660.
AIR x™ allows precise slice placement to provide fast, consistent scans regardless of patient position, time between scans, or technologist.
Imaging Protocol Manager is a cloud-based, multimodality solution that provides access, insight, and governance to standardize imaging device protocols across the enterprise.
SonoCNS on Voluson™ assists the user to properly align, display, and measure the ISUOG recommended views of the fetal brain.
Edison Open AI Orchestrator simplifies the selection, deployment, and usage of AI in imaging workflows at scale.

title.en-US: Breast Assistant, powered by Koios DS™

description.en-US: Breast Assistant, powered by Koios DS™, on LOGIQ™ E10 automatically provides an AI-based quantitative risk assessment that aligns to a BI-RADS® category. Results are available in two seconds or less, providing decision support for the clinician.

Critical Care Suite automatically analyzes images upon acquisition, for critical findings (pneumothorax), producing triage notifications sent directly to PACS without having to route images to an Edge Server or Cloud AI solution.

title.en-US: Infrastructure to build and deploy at scale

description.en-US: Drawing on GE Healthcare’s deep domain expertise, the Edison platform offers an extensive catalog of healthcare-specific services that enable rapid and compliant design, development, and deployment of secure applications and algorithms.

title.en-US: Using data to inform decision making

description.en-US: Vast amounts of data accompany every patient’s journey. Edison converts this ocean of information into actionable insights using analytics, machine learning, deep learning, and Artificial Intelligence (AI). These insights help you increase productivity, prioritize workflows, reduce rework, and deliver the most personalized patient care possible.

Edison is GE Healthcare’s intelligence platform designed to help you achieve greater efficiency, improve patient outcomes, and increase access to care. Embedded within existing workflows, Edison applications can integrate and assimilate data from disparate sources, and apply analytics or advanced algorithms to generate clinical, operational, and financial insights. Edison solutions can be securely deployed via Cloud, Edison HealthLink, or directly onto smart devices.
  • …
Trusted. Reliable. Simple.
description.fr: De confiance. Fiable. Facile.

description.en-US: GE Healthcare is providing additional information about our accessories and supplies to help support you during the COVID-19 pandemic.
description.fr: GE Healthcare fournit des informations supplémentaires sur nos accessoires et fournitures pour vous aider pendant la pandémie COVID-19.

en-US.Content:
Support for innovators advancing healthcare

Streamlining the commercialization of your technology for faster adoption, the GE Healthcare Edison Developer Program helps market-ready independent software vendors (ISVs) and builders deploy and deliver advanced healthcare applications. Guided by AI principles and a century-long track record, join a global community you can trust.

description.en-US: Our team of analytics visionaries, healthcare experts, and data scientists work at the forefront of their fields while inspiring others to do the same. From high-level industry overviews to deep dives into clinical initiatives, they'll bring their expertise and elevate the conversation at your next event.
Patient connections, filters, masks, and more to help ensure clinical safety and accuracy.
description.fr: Connexions patient, filtres, masques, etc. pour garantir la sécurité et la précision cliniques.

description.fr: Les offres de services comprennent l'évaluation du site, la surveillance, l'installation clé en main et les contrats de service.

description.en-US: Modern healthcare facilities face a range of challenges in protecting their medical equipment investment and expanding their clinical capabilities. Even purchasing accessories and supplies from a non-GE source for your equipment is often more confusing, expensive, and time-consuming than necessary.
description.fr: Les établissements de santé modernes sont confrontés à une série de défis pour protéger leur investissement en équipement médical et étendre leurs capacités cliniques. Même l'achat d'accessoires et de fournitures auprès d'une source non GE pour votre équipement est souvent plus déroutant, coûteux et prend plus de temps que nécessaire.

title.fr: Soins de santé @ travail: une série de nouvelles

description.en-US: With challenging situations come remarkable stories, and nowhere has that been more apparent this year than in the healthcare industry. Mikey Kay, correspondent and filmmaker, is reporting live from the field on the latest news and stories.
description.fr: Les situations difficiles s'accompagnent d'histoires remarquables, et cela n'a été nulle part plus évident cette année que dans le secteur de la santé. Mikey Kay, correspondant et réalisateur, rapporte en direct sur le terrain les dernières nouvelles et histoires.

title.fr: L'effet de l'IA: un nouveau rapport sur l'impact de l'IA sur les soins de santé aujourd'hui par MIT Technology Review Insights et GE Healthcare

description.en-US: Research shows that Artificial Intelligence (AI) can help healthcare professionals do their jobs the way they’ve always wanted to by giving them the time and tools to focus on what matters and build a more efficient and intelligent ecosystem for patient care.
description.fr: La recherche montre que l'intelligence artificielle (IA) peut aider les professionnels de la santé à faire leur travail comme ils l'ont toujours voulu en leur donnant le temps et les outils nécessaires pour se concentrer sur ce qui compte et créer un écosystème plus efficace et intelligent pour les soins aux patients.

title.fr: Mois de la sensibilisation au cancer du sein

description.en-US:
Please Don't Skip
25% of women skip their annual mammogram exams due to fear of pain and anxiety.
See how we're honoring women this year during Breast Cancer Awareness Month.
description.fr: Veuillez ne pas sauter25% des femmes sautent leurs examens annuels de mammographie par peur de la douleur et de l'anxiété.Voyez comment nous honorons les femmes cette année pendant le Mois de la sensibilisation au cancer du sein.

title.en-US: Empowering You to Make the Difference
title.fr: Vous donner les moyens de faire la différence

description.en-US: LOGIQ™ E10 Series: next-generation, leadership ultrasound that adapts to your needs, today and into the future.
description.fr: Série LOGIQ ™ E10: échographie de pointe de nouvelle génération qui s'adapte à vos besoins, aujourd'hui et demain.

description.en-US:
Healthcare has never been more accessible, intelligent or dynamic. It’s also never been under more pressure, from rising costs to aging populations.

That’s where we come in – you and us, the clinicians and professionals on the frontlines of delivering healthcare for your patients and communities and those building the intelligent devices, data analytics, applications and services to enable you to do so more efficiently and with better outcomes.
description.fr:
La santé n'a jamais été aussi accessible, intelligente ou dynamique. Il n’a jamais été aussi soumis à autant de pressions, de l’augmentation des coûts au vieillissement de la population.

C’est là que nous intervenons - vous et nous, les cliniciens et les professionnels en première ligne de la prestation de soins de santé pour vos patients et communautés et ceux qui construisent le appareils intelligents , analyses de données, applications et services pour vous permettre de le faire plus efficacement et avec de meilleurs résultats.

subTitle.en-US: A healthier world with more precise and efficient care
subTitle.fr: Un monde plus sain avec des soins plus précis et efficaces

shortBio.en-US: Research and recommendations for modern stack websites.

description.en-US: Webhooks notify you, another person or system when resources have changed by calling a given HTTP endpoint.

body.en-US:
## What are webhooks?

The webhooks are used to notify you when content has been changed. Specify a URL, configure your webhook, and we will send an HTTP POST request whenever something happens to your content.

## How do I configure a webhook?

Go to Settings → Webhooks from the navigation bar at the top. From there, hit Add webhook, and you will be directed to your new webhook. Then choose a name, put in the information of your HTTP endpoint (URL and authentication), specify any custom headers and select the types of events that should trigger the webhook.

## Why do I get an old version in the CDA?

As the delivery API is powered by a CDN network consisting of hundreds of servers distributed across continents, it takes some time (up to a few minutes) to reflect the changes to the published content. This must be taken into consideration when reacting to webhooks. In normal conditions, there could be a reasonable delay of 2 to 5 minutes.

Extracted from the [Webhooks FAQ](https://www.contentful.com/faq/webhooks/ "Webhooks FAQ").

description.en-US: Your very first content with Contentful, pulled in JSON format using the Content Delivery API.

body.en-US:
These is your very first content with Contentful, pulled in JSON format using the [Content Delivery API](https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-delivery-api/ "Content Delivery API"). Content and presentation are now decoupled, allowing you to focus your efforts in building the perfect app.

## Your first steps

Building with Contentful is easy. First take a moment to get [the basics of content modelling](https://www.contentful.com/r/knowledgebase/content-modelling-basics/ "the basics of content modelling"), which you can set up in the [Contentful Web app](https://app.contentful.com/ "Contentful Web app"). Once you get that, feel free to drop by the [Documentation](https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/ "Documentation") to learn a bit more about how to build your app with Contentful, in particular the [API basics](https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/concepts/apis/ "API basics") and each one of our four APIs, as shown below.

### Content Delivery API

The [Content Delivery API](https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-delivery-api/ "Content Delivery API") (CDA), available at `cdn.contentful.com`, is a read-only API for delivering content from Contentful to apps, websites and other media. Content is delivered as JSON data, and images, videos and other media as files.
The API is available via a globally distributed content delivery network. The server closest to the user serves all content, both JSON and binary. This minimizes latency, which especially benefits mobile apps. Hosting content in multiple global data centers also greatly improves the availability of content.

### Content Management API

The [Content Management API](https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/ "Content Management API") (CMA), available at `api.contentful.com`, is a read-write API for managing content. Unlike the Content Delivery API, the management API requires you to authenticate as a Contentful user. You could use the CMA for several use cases, such as:
* Automatic imports from different CMSes like WordPress or Drupal.
* Integration with other backend systems, such as an e-commerce shop.
* Building custom editing experiences. We built the [Contentful Web app](https://app.contentful.com/ "Contentful Web app") on top of this API.

### Preview API

The [Content Preview API](https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/concepts/apis/#content-preview-api "Content Preview API"), available at `preview.contentful.com`, is a variant of the CDA for previewing your content before delivering it to your customers. You use the Content Preview API in combination with a "preview" deployment of your website (or a "preview" build of your mobile app) that allows content managers and authors to view their work in-context, as if it were published, using a "preview" access token as though it were delivered by the CDA.

### Images API

The [Images API](https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/concepts/apis/#images-api "Images API"), available at `images.contentful.com`, allows you to resize and crop images, change their background color and convert them to different formats. Using our API for these transformations lets you upload high-quality assets, deliver exactly what your app needs, and still get all the benefits of our caching CDN.

description.en-US: Worry less about security, caching, and talking to the server. Static sites are the new thing.

body.en-US:
## The case for the static site generator

More and more developers are jumping on the "go static train", and rightfully so. Static pages are fast, lightweight, they scale well. They are more secure, and simple to maintain and they allow you to focus all your time and effort on the user interface. Often times, this dedication really shows.

It just so happens that static site generators are mostly loved by developers, but not by the average Joe. They do not offer WYSIWYG, previewing on demo sites may take an update cycle, they are often based on markdown text files, and they require some knowledge of modern day repositories.

Moreover, when teams are collaborating, it can get complicated quickly. Has this article already been proof-read or reviewed? Is this input valid? Are user permissions available, e.g. for administering adding and removing team members? Can this article be published at a future date? How can a large repository of content be categorized, organized, and searched? All these requirements have previously been more or less solved within the admin area of your CMS. But of course with all the baggage that made you leave the appserver-app-database-in-one-big-blob stack in the first place.

## Content APIs to the rescue

An alternative is decoupling the content management aspect from the system. And then replacing the maintenance prone server with a cloud based web service offering. Effectively, instead of your CMS of old, you move to a [Content Management as a Service (CMaaS)](https://www.contentful.com/r/knowledgebase/content-as-a-service/ "Content Management as a Service (CMaaS)") world, with a content API to deliver all your content. That way, you get the all the [benefits of content management features](http://www.digett.com/blog/01/16/2014/pairing-static-websites-cms "benefits of content management features") while still being able to embrace the static site generator mantra.

It so happens that Contentful is offering just that kind of content API. A service that

* from the ground up has been designed to be fast, scalable, secure, and offer high uptime, so that you don’t have to worry about maintenance ever again.
* offers a powerful editor and lots of flexibility in creating templates for your documents that your editors can reuse and combine, so that no developers resources are required in everyday writing and updating tasks.
* separates content from presentation, so you can reuse your content repository for any device platform your heart desires. That way, you can COPE ("create once, publish everywhere").
* offers webhooks that you can use to rebuild your static site in a fully automated fashion every time your content is modified.

Extracted from the article [CMS-functionality for static site generators](https://www.contentful.com/r/knowledgebase/contentful-api-cms-static-site-generators/ "CMS-functionality for static site generators"). Read more about the [static site generators supported by Contentful](https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/tools/staticsitegenerators/ "static site generators supported by Contentful").
